Tucson first holds Rodimus's hand gently with a smile on his face.  He was =
happy to see his comrade back on the mend.  And now he was never going to a=
llow anything else to happen to him.  He takes his words into consideration=
 with a nodd of compliance.

"Understood Rodimus.  I will not underestimate=
 Cyclonus by any means, but I will do my best to be sure that neither he or=
 Hydras lays another harmful hand on any of the Maximals or Autobots ever a=
gain.  And this time, I'm very happy to have the help.  I'll need it, I may=
 be a Prime, but I know even the best of warriors can do with having good c=
omrades on his side.  Legacy, I will be grateful for anything you can do to=
 help Perceptor.  And if Perceptor is comfortable with the extensive repair=
s, by all means, do try, but if it doesn't work, I will also understand.  W=
hen I was last examined, I was also told that my damage may be far too exte=
nsive to repair by normal means."

He then turns to Stanton.

"Stanton, I h=
ave something for Nightlight.  I hope it will be enough to restore her."

H=
e opens his chest and reveals his pulsating orb, which pulsates twice and f=
orms a smaller version of itself.  The small orb of energy pulsates in time=
 with his own.  He presents it to Stanton.

" This is what helped me to bri=
ng Rodimus back.  It's a power that feeds off of compassion, hope, understa=
nding, and kindness.   The power of unity, and a simple force that we all p=
ossess to a level of degree.  It's what drew Rat Trap to find me, and what =
drew me to Talon and all of you.  And now, I wish to extend this to Nightli=
ght, in hopes that the compassion we all share, will be enough to help her =
through this difficult time."

Straight Shot smiles as her own heart spark =
beats within her chest.

" Love is definitely something our enemy doesn't h=
ave.  And there's no other force greater than that."
